sentences.sContent: Adequate vitamin D prevents the development of bone diseases such as rickets, osteomalacia and osteoporosis.
sentences.sCn: 充足的维生素D可预防形成骨骼疾病，例如佝偻病、骨软化和骨质疏松。

words.tran: 摇晃的；虚弱的；患佝偻病的

trans.tranOther: a disease that children get in which their bones become soft and bent, caused by a lack of  vitamin  D
